description.value:
Trigger 1 round passes since both isqulugs in area B6 are slain, or 10 rounds pass since they rolled initiative

Effect The isqulugs die horribly (if they're still alive), rent by clawed fey hands. Spectral fey pull at the other creatures in the caves, all of which must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:36] save. The haunt then rolls initiative.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is pulled 10 feet toward the standing stones.

Failure The creature is pulled 15 feet toward the standing stones.

Critical Failure The creature is pulled 15 feet toward the standing stones, knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Prone], and takes 1d6 bludgeoning damage (in addition to any damage from the toxic water).

details.description: Countless fey with grisly visages and misshapen bodies cavort throughout the room, kicking up caustic debris and pulling other creatures into their dangerous dance.
details.disable: @Check[type:nature|dc:32] or @Check[type:occultism|dc:32] (expert) to perform a ritual to ward the area against fey intrusion, @Check[type:performance|dc:34] (master) to meet the Twisted King's demands with a disturbing dance, or @Check[type:athletics|dc:32] or @Check[type:intimidation|dc:32] (expert) to fend off or frighten the fey dancers. Three total successes are required to disable the haunt, and each check takes 2 actions.
details.reset: The haunt deactivates after 1 minute. It re-forms every new moon. If all of the glyphs in area B6 are restored—a process requiring 10 days of downtime and 10 successful @Check[type:nature|dc:36] or @Check[type:occultism|dc:36] checks—the haunt becomes permanently disabled and doesn't re-form.
details.routine: (1 action) Spectral fey cavort about the room. All creatures in the room are raked by ghostly claws and splashed with toxic water, taking @Damage[(1d10+14)[force],2d10[acid]] damage (@Check[type:reflex|dc:32|basic:true] save). Creatures that critically fail their Reflex saves are pulled 10 feet toward the standing stones.
